archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Resolve Party Revenue Share Discrepancy
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Contacts a party regarding a discrepancy, work with the party to identify the cause of the discrepancy, and determine how to resolve the discrepancy.

properties.value: Resolve Party Revenue Share Discrepancy contacts a party regarding a discrepancy, works with the party to identify the cause of the discrepancy, and determines how to resolve the discrepancy. Because different forms of information can be provided by a party other processes may be involved. For example, if an bill/invoice is provided by a party then the Party Bill Inquiry Handling process may be invoked; if a payment is provided then the Party Payment Handling process may be invoked; if a revenue share notification is provided then the Identify Party Revenue Share Adjustment process may be invoked.
